Suivez toutes vos compétitions préférées (Ligue 1, Ligue 2, Ligue des champions, championnats étrangers, Coupe du Monde et Euro…) et avec les alertes personnalisées ne ratez rien de toute l'actualité sportive.


L'Équipe Explore : la nouvelle plateforme de contenus réservés uniquement aux abonnés. Chaque semaine, explorez le sport à travers des enquêtes, des séries, des stories, des podcasts ou des documentaires interactifs. 


L'Équipe Live : suivez chaîne L’Équipe en direct et en replay, le programme des événements à venir, toutes vos émissions préférées (L’Équipe de Greg, L’Équipe du soir, La petite lucarne…), et un grand catalogue d’événements sportifs : Super Bowl, Copa America, Coupe du monde des clubs, Coupe du Roi, Euroligue, ATP 250, Biathlon, Formule E, Meeting d’athlétisme, handball, ski alpin…


Kiosque : tous les matins, dès 00h30, profitez du journal quotidien L’Équipe sur iPhone et iPad. Avec son sommaire, son zoom performant et sa fonction de lecture article par article profitez d’un vrai confort de lecture et emmenez votre journal partout avec vous. Téléchargez également les autres titres du groupe L’Équipe : le Magazine, Vélo Magazine, France Football, les Hors-Série…


Directs : suivez l'évolution des scores de tous les matches en direct à travers des statistiques détaillées et des commentaires en temps réel de la rédaction. Configurez vos favoris et vos alertes et suivez l’évolution du score de vos rencontres et de vos événements préférées. Et retrouvez tous les classements, résultats et statistiques à travers nos fiches joueurs et nos fiches équipes.




L’application propose plusieurs offres d’abonnement à partir de 9,99€/mois (1er mois à 0,99€) sans engagement permettant d’accéder à : 
- tous les articles abonnés en illimités, 
- l’intégralité des contenus L'Équipe Explore (enquêtes, des séries, des stories, des podcasts)
- le journal quotidien en version numérique dès 00h30 
- des rencontres abonnés inédites avec des sportifs de haut niveau
- des réductions sur la boutiques des Unes et photos 
- des contenus personnalisés 
- les notes des matches…

- Plusieurs comptes simultanés



Si vous ne souhaitez pas vous abonner mais quand même faire partie de notre communauté L'Équipe, vous pouvez créer un compte gratuitement et profiter de nos avantages membres : 
- Mise en favoris de vos contenus préférés 
- Espace commentaire 
- Dark mode 
- Personnalisation des alertes 
- Newsletters personnalisées 
- Intégralités des vidéos (Live) 



Note : le montant de l’abonnement est débité sur votre compte iTunes automatiquement à la confirmation de l’abonnement. L’abonnement est automatiquement reconduit sauf si cette option est désactivée dans les vingt-quatre heures précédant la fin de la période en cours.
L’abonnement et son renouvellement peuvent être gérés en vous rendant sur votre compte dans l’App Store après l’achat.

The APP of Dolomiti Superski is supposed to be a real online ski guide for those who want to discover the world’s largest ski carousel and is supported by all the operating systems of the most common smart phones. It has new graphics and a modern navigation: horizontal movements (swipe) allow users to switch from one of the 12 ski areas of Dolomiti Superski to the next in numerical order, while vertical movements (scroll) lead to various menu options, functions and services within the chosen ski area. If the GPS function of the device is activated, when the APP is launched, the system will lead to a contents page for the Dolomiti Superski ski area in which the user is located. One can login through the "MyDolomiti" community, after having registered (free of charge) to use the services. The APP offers useful information such as the open/closed status of individual lifts and slopes in real time, opening hours of the lifts, breaks, weather forecasts, points of interest such as ski schools, ski rentals, infopoints, Pick-up Box, as well as descriptions and contacts. 
The user will also find other interesting and popular functions, such as the Performance Check, Tracking option to record the route taken while skiing, Routing which will navigate you to a predetermined point on the slopes. By reaching certain goals with the "Tracking" function, the user will be assigned interesting Badges - a great way to challenge yourself! And finally, you get to play too since the registered members of the APP-community can also have fun with the APP's game functions, creating their network of friends, who must also be registered members and in possession of a Dolomiti Superski ski pass and challenging each other throughout the ski season.
Discover the new APP’s full potential watching the video tutorials.

In 2020, a groundbreaking, new sports philosophy for the Grand Duchy was created, based on the LTAD – Lëtzebuerg lieft Sport concept. The Ministry of Sport, ENEPS, COSL, the Sportlycée and the LIHPS have come together to take on this complex task. The result of this intensive process is a collectively defined joint strategy that covers sports policy, federations, clubs and coaches, as well as athletes and their environment, based on the LTAD framework. 
This knowledge app was developed primarily for coaches, educators and teaching staff, regardless of whether they are involved at federation level, in a club, in a commune, in education and care services for children, or otherwise. It uses instructional materials to provide quick and easy tutorials that suit the user’s age, personal goals or ability level. 
National and international experts from a wide range of sports and fields of specialisation impart their skills and expertise, each bringing knowledge from their own sporting disciplines and interdisciplinary expertise together on one digital platform. The sport and physical activity sector in Luxembourg, therefore, has the perfect opportunity to improve its network, expand its expertise and exchange both experience and knowledge thanks to this app. Indeed, LTAD – Lëtzebuerg lieft Sport allows to consider athletes’ individual development phases, their age-specific requirements and their personal goals, thus creating a holistic source of interdisciplinary expertise, drawn from a wide variety of sports, based on a training philosophy. Areas such as strength, endurance and speed training, as well as fundamental motor skills, technique, strategy and tactics are covered, primarily in the form of videos. 
In the near future, however, the app also has the potential to expand its reach even further and to become a means of help and support for sport and physical activity throughout Luxembourg. This will allow parents, referees, sports officials and the athletes themselves to draw both inspiration and information about current training and further education in the sport and physical activity sector. 
In the spirit of today’s sharing mentality, everybody involved in sport in the Grand Duchy should be able to benefit from the contributing experts’ knowledge.

Very easy to use and 100% free, TeamPulse is an application that aims to simplify the management of your team.

No more SMS, calls, emails or Facebook groups to try to communicate with your teammates, Team Pulse offers you all the features you need to manage your team in one application.

- SCHEDULE: Add your recurring events (trainings), one-off events (specific trainings, meetings, parties) or your matches in a few seconds.

- SOCIAL: Take advantage of a dedicated Locker Room tab for each of your teams where each member can express himself, react and share photos, videos or documents with the whole group.

- MESSAGING: Take advantage of a Messaging module allowing you to send personal and group messages to all the players of your different teams.

- MULTI-TEAMS: Manage or become a member of as many teams as you want. Ideal if you play and coach in two different teams for example.
